translations: n.（古罗马的）保民官，护民官；公民权利捍卫者，人民的斗士；（用于报刊名）论坛，讲坛；军事高官

sentences.sentence: Clarence Page is a columnist for the Chicago Tribune.
sentences.translation: 克拉伦斯·佩奇是《芝加哥论坛报》的专栏记者。

sentences.sentence: The trouble began when Allan gave an interview to the Chicago Tribune last month.
sentences.translation: 麻烦开始于艾伦上个月接受《芝加哥论坛报》的采访。

sentences.sentence: The "New York Tribune" namelessly attributed the innovation of the hamburger to the stand on the pike.
sentences.translation: 《纽约论坛报》匿名地将汉堡的创新归因于路边摊。
